Posts.Content: On 2/27/2007 Hana24 wrote: Does anyone know of any food to eat that's good for metastatic BC? I heard apricot seed(boiled) is good. My mom has the cancer and her appitite is not that good, she is "5,0 and is about 89lbs now!!  I need some good nutrition advise please! Thank you  Oh Yeah, is coffee and white rice bad? Concerned daughter :/  Hello Hana24   My mom also has metastatic breast cancer in her bones. She has has 4 broken bones in the last 3 years with surgery, radiation and chemo to follow. I have found myself buying all types of food at the store. I let my mom decide but I try to tell her she has to eat something. Ginger is good if she is sick to her stomach. My mom eats lots of gello, pudding, apple sauce but definatly try to get your mom to eat something with protein. God Bless Eve
Posts.Title: nutrition
